mod.name: Aigis Mod
mod.credits: Basemod, ModTheSpire, #modding, Gremious for the STSDefaultBase
mod.description:
Mod inspired in the Tower Defence game Millennium War Aigis. Play with cards based in the characters and their skills.

        Adds 3 new characters: the Prince, the White Emperor and The Avenger.

        Adds 75+ cards, 23 new relics, 4 potions and 1 new event for the Prince.
        Adds 75+ cards, 13 new relics and 4 potions for the Emperor.
        Adds 75+ cards and 10 new Relics for the Avenger.

cards.name: Air Signal
cards.description:
Retain.
Add 1 Aerial from Discard Pile to hand and it becomes cost 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Air Signal+
cards.description:
Retain.
Add 1 Aerial from Discard Pile to hand, it becomes cost 0 this turn and deals 1 more damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Barricade
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
aigismod:Skill_charge: Reduce this card Block by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Barricade+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block.
aigismod:Skill_charge: Reduce this card Block by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Calamity Averting Mirror
cards.description:
Gain Retain this turn when used.
If this is in hand when you would die, heal to 15 % of Max HP and Exhaust this.

cards.name: Calamity Averting Mirror+
cards.description:
Gain Retain this turn when used.
If this is in hand when you would die, heal to 30 % of Max HP and Exhaust this.

cards.name: Golem Fragment
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 16 Block.
If 4 Golem Fragment are Exhausted, deal 60 Damage to a random enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golem Fragment+
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 22 Block.
If 4 Golem Fragment are Exhausted, deal 75 Damage to a random enemy.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Descendant Of a Hero
relics.description:
Draw an additional card at the start of combat.
Every 4 combats won, obtain a permanent effect, up to 4 effects.

relics.name: Hero Crystal
relics.description: Gain 1 point for winning a combat. While on the Map screen (outside of combat/event/campfire), Right-click this relic and spend 200 Gold and 5 points to add a Uncommon Hero Card. Adding a duplicate upgrades the card instead.
relics.flavorText: Solais: As a reward for conquering the tower's (Spire's) floors, I'll give you 'Hero Crystals.

relics.name: Hero of the Empire
relics.description: Every 5 combats won, obtain a permanent effect, up to 4 effects.
relics.flavorText: A title bestowed to the strongest in the Empire.

relics.name: Old Clergyman
relics.description: Once per combat, press Right-click to exhaust 1 card in your hand. If its an Undead character gain [E] equal to it's cost.
relics.flavorText: Vincent:One day when I got home from work, I found that my wife and daughter had been attacked and bitten by vampires.

relics.name: Ate
relics.description: When you draw a card with an original cost of 4 gain [E]
relics.flavorText: Kibahime: Offending an oni is really scary, okay?

relics.name: Cat's Disturbance
relics.description: All enemies start the combat with 1 less Strength. On the 6th turn, all enemies lose 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Koharu: Instilling fear in people is quite boorish. I confer passion.

relics.name: Impenetrable Fortress
relics.description: Start the combat with 2 Dexterity. At the start of every turn increase the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 for the turn.
relics.flavorText: Louise: Even if there is no country, I will fight for the remaining people.

relics.name: Imperial Knight Escort
relics.description:
Star each combat with 1 Imperial Knight Lux in your hand.
When you draw an Imperial Knight gain 1 Strength for the turn.
relics.flavorText: I am known as Lux. I am a proud knight of the White Empire.

relics.name: Imperial Sniper
relics.description: During Boss or Elite combats, if you defeat a enemy, gain [E] and 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Ralph became the leader of the sniper unit as a result of his prowess in rapid fire combat.

relics.name: Imperial Tactics
relics.description:
When you play Leona or Leora, gain [E]
When you play a Defend gain 3 Counter.
relics.flavorText: The White Empire's number one strategist who is known as the Undefeated Mastermind.

relics.name: Royal Highness
relics.description: Once per turn, when you draw or play a Princess gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity for the turn.
relics.flavorText: Sybilla:If we created a kingdom, it would be splendid, don't you think?.

relics.name: Scramble Golem
relics.description: Once per combat, you can right-click this relic to exhaust 1 Card in your hand, if it is a Golem Fragment, gain 3 Metallicize.
relics.flavorText: Rilke: What, you want me to read your fortune?

relics.name: Summoned Ifrit
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 6 Burn to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Solano: Come, I Summon the Beast of flame, Ifrit!

relics.name: Suppressing Darkness Aura
relics.description: If you played no Attack cards in a turn apply 1 Weak to all enemies and gain 8 block.
relics.flavorText: Dark Knight: I already gave up mine own life. Use me as naught more than a sacrificial pawn..

relics.name: World Tree Guard
relics.description: Start each combat with 8 Ranger Trap. Archers deal 1 additional damage while you have Ranger Trap.
relics.flavorText: Rovinia: Are you okay? Are you sleeping well?

relics.name: Aerial Fight
relics.description: Twice per turn, while you have cards in your draw pile, when you draw an Air Signal draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Keitridge: Higher than the heavens, faster than the wind! I'm cool as I fly!.

relics.name: Dark Guild's Servant
relics.description: When Assassination is triggered, draw 1 card and gain 8 Gold (Gold gain is once per combat).
relics.flavorText: Irene: From personal care to assassinations and intelligence gathering, please entrust me with any task.

relics.name: Demon Chief's Command
relics.description:
Once per combat you can Right Click this relic to Exhaust 1 card in your hand.
If you exhaust a Demon with this relic gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Mephisto: It is barbaric to obtain everything with might. Allow me to test your intellect.

relics.name: Demonic Territory
relics.description:
For the first 5 turns in a combat, gain 1 Damage Aura.
At the end of your turn, if you played a Demon Power card, gain block equal to Damage Aura.
relics.flavorText: Lapis: I'll lend you my power...be thankful.

relics.name: Golem Boost
relics.description: Start the each combat with a Golem Fragment+ in hand. When a Golem Fragment is created, upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: Anri: I grant power to lifeless objects. Please make good use of the essence of enchantment.

relics.name: Imperial Agent
relics.description: When an enemy is defeated, apply 2 Weak and 2 Vulnerable to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Viktor: I was once known as the Empire’s most heinous criminal.

relics.name: Imperial Heavy Infantry
relics.description:
Defends gain 1 more Block.
Each time you play 8 Imperial cards you gain 4 Block.
relics.flavorText: Dwight: My loyalty will not waver, so I will not remove this armor.

relics.name: Pill of Hard Flame
relics.description: Shuriken Cards deal 3 more damage. You can Right-Click this Relic to lose 10 HP (Intangible won't reduce this damage) and add 1 Setsuna to your hand. Usable once per combat.
relics.flavorText: Setsuna: One of the Oni-bashu, Setsuna, is here! What do you think?　Was it cool?

relics.name: Tengu's Blaze
relics.description: Once per combat, you can right-click this relic to exhaust 1 card in your hand, if it is a Curse or Status, draw 1 card and all enemies gain 3 Burn.
relics.flavorText: Guren: Show me the ideal end. I'll lend you my strength until then.

relics.name: Treasure of Healing
relics.description: When you recover HP, exhaust 1 random Status Card from hand, discard or draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Liana: I don't want to just heal wounds, but hearts as well.

relics.name: Undead World
relics.description: Start each combat with 3 Skeleton Unit and 1 Metus in Exhaust Pile. Once per combat, if you have 30% of HP or less, you can Right-click this relic, add 1 Undead from Exhaust Pile to hand.
relics.flavorText: Metus: You want to be my friend? Sure, if you're willing to become a ghost.

relics.name: Wound-Returning Spell
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Shikioni in hand. Shikioni gains 3 additional Block.
relics.flavorText: Mikoto: Would you allow me to cast misfortunes off of you?

relics.name: Magic Acceleration
relics.description: Sluggish will not remove Slow. When you play a Witch, draw a card.
relics.flavorText: Towa: Allow me to show you the power as the Lord of Time.

relics.name: Serpent's Curse Poison
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 2 Cursed Voice to all enemies. When an enemy attacks, it gains 1 Poison.
relics.flavorText: Orochihime: It could be a poison, or a medicine. Fufufu, I wonder which is which?

relics.name: White Dragon's Preparations
relics.description: Three times per combat: if you play an Imperial and a Demon in the same turn gain [E]
relics.flavorText: Sabein: No longer do such things as race or nationality divide us.

relics.name: White Witch's Wisdom
relics.description: Enemies start with 1 Sluggish (temporal Slow). If you use 2 Witch cards in a single turn, deal 3 damage to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Belinda: Mother is a busybody. I can do it myself, but...

relics.name: Call for Help
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each combat. Add 1 Ambushed Caravan to your Deck.
relics.flavorText: Totono: Haa... I still don't have enough money.

relics.name: Chosen of Adamas
relics.description: Strikes and Defends become cost 0.
relics.flavorText: White Emperor: It's not just my honor and status, but also precious people, beloved ones, that must be protected.

relics.name: Cursed Boundary
relics.description: If you have a Curse in your Deck when picking this relic, add 1 Katara Upgraded. Once per turn, press Right-click to discard 1 Curse card in your hand to deal 5 damage to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Katara:What I possess is merely a single piece of The Power of Destruction that has been passed down within my clan.

relics.name: Daywalker
relics.description: Vampire Bite is reduced by 3 instead. When you attack an enemy with Vampire Bite, gain 1 Temporary HP.
relics.flavorText: Eden: My memories before I became a vampire? I don't remember...

relics.name: Hero King's Successor
relics.description: Add 1 Sword of Salvation to your Deck.At the end of your turn, if you have no cards in hand, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Sybilla: Everyone is waiting for the Prince's words. The words of the new Hero King.

relics.name: Imperial Rapid Deployment
relics.description:
If you used only Imperial cards in a turn, gain [E] next turn.
Start each combat with an Imperial Airship in your hand.
relics.flavorText: White Emperor: How many victories that can be obtained.

relics.name: Magnum Opus
relics.description: Gain 1 Potion slot. When you use a Potion, upgrade all Common and Uncommon cards in your hand during this combat.
relics.flavorText: Helmine: You see, I'm a certified alchemist of the White Empire.

relics.name: Sacred Treasure's Successor
relics.description: Gain 1 Dexterity at the start of each combat. Add 1 Sacred Treasure of Aigis to your Deck.When you play an Skill gain 1 counter.
relics.flavorText: Anna: The sacred treasures that are the arms of Aigis were originally used by the gods.

relics.name: Title:God Slaying Hero
relics.description: Add 1 Sacred Treasure of Keraunos to your Deck.At the end of your turn, if you have no [E] deal 5 damage to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Let me give you, who is the hero that prevailed over Keraunos, the sacred treasure of the goddess

relics.name: Curse of death
relics.description: While you have 3 or more Curses in Master Deck, at the end of your turn, defeat all enemies with Weak that have 10% or less of their max HP.
relics.flavorText: Mitra: The ability known as a 'curse' is a double-edged sword that will shave away ones own life if it's not used correctly.

relics.name: Fidelity of Harmony
relics.description: Add 1 Kaguya or Hikage (if you have Kaguya) to your Deck. Each 5 Eastern Country or Shuriken cards you play gain [E] Reset counter on battle end.
relics.flavorText: Kaguya:It was just a political marriage, but ... I'm glad you were my husband.

relics.name: Poster Girl's Invitation
relics.description: Add 1 Junon upgraded to your deck. Receive an extra card reward on normal and elite combats, but only includes common cards.
relics.flavorText: Junon: My shop's pretty popular, y'know!.

relics.name: Smile of Happy Wishes
relics.description: Upgrade 1 Rozette in your Deck or add 1 Rozette upgraded to your deck. When you add a common card to your deck, upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: Rozette: I wield this sword because of my dead kingdom

keywords.name: Air Elemental
keywords.description: When you play a Skill, enemy loses HP equal to stacks. Remove 1 stack at the end of the turn if enemy attacked.

keywords.name: Ambushed Caravan
keywords.description: Curse. Unplayable, retain, innate, cannot be removed from your deck. When you take unblocked damage, lose 8 gold.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Archer
keywords.description: This card ignores Thorns, Angry, Sharp Hides and Curl Up.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Assassination
keywords.description: If it defeats an enemy, return this to hand and this card cost becomes 0 for the turn.

keywords.name: Bloom Petal
keywords.description: On your second turn after getting this power: all enemies receive damage (equal to this amount), 2 Weak and 2 Vulnerable, then this power is removed.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Burn
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, if the enemy intends to attack, that enemy takes damage. Burn is reduced at the start of the turn

keywords.name: Aigismod:Cooldown
keywords.description: When this reaches 0, next use applies an extra effect.

keywords.name: Corpse Marionette
keywords.description: When you take unblocked damage, reduce stacks equal to that amount. At turn start, if this has 0 stacks, stun all enemies and remove this power.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Counter
keywords.description: When attacked, deal damage back to the enemy equal to the number of counter. Removed at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Cursed
keywords.description: For each curse card in your Master Deck, apply the following effect.

keywords.name: Cursed Rite
keywords.description: You can't heal.

keywords.name: Cursed Voice
keywords.description: Negate the next buff the enemy would gain.

keywords.name: Damage Aura
keywords.description: On turn end, deal damage equal to amount to all enemies.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Entangled
keywords.description: You cannot play attacks. Remove 1 stack at beginning of your turn.

keywords.name: Imperial Knight
keywords.description: Applies an effect once per turn when playing an Imperial card while this is in hand.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Ninjutsu
keywords.description: Add 1 Shuriken at turn start. Each additional Ninjutsu you play increases the amount of hits the Shuriken does by 1.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Pair
keywords.description: Add 1 card with the indicated name from Draw Pile to hand.

keywords.name: Ranger Trap
keywords.description: When you take an unblocked damage, deal damage to that enemy equal to amount and lose this power..

keywords.name: Seal Talisman
keywords.description: When the enemy attack, that enemy loses 1 Strength. Seal Talisman is reduced by 1 at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Skill Charge
keywords.description: Retain. On retain, increase this card power.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Sluggish
keywords.description: Enemies gain Slow when applied. When Sluggish reaches 0, Slow is removed.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Splash
keywords.description: All other enemies will receive half (rounded down) of the damage from the target monster.

keywords.name: True Damage
keywords.description: Attack from this card ignore Block and ignores Thorns, Angry, Sharp Hides and Curl Up.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Undead
keywords.description: Trigger this effect when Exhausted.

keywords.name: Aigismod:Vampire
keywords.description: Attacked enemy gains Vampire Bite equal to unblocked damage. When Vampire Bite reaches 60, stun that enemy and that enemy receives 1 Stun Resistance.
